Text: Industrial WebsiteBecome a SponsorAdvertiser for only per year Add your Company for Only per year Industrial Website Please take a moment to view our site Our Website is totally free However we need SponsorsAdvertisers such as your self to help us increase our traffic so that we can offer new services to our users Our goal is to help those who help themselves By becoming a SponsorAdvertiser we will advertise your Company on our Website The best part of our SponsorAdvertiser Program is the cost of only per year Unlike other Companies should you reply to this email informing us that you will Sponsor our Website and that your payment is on its way we will add your link before payment is received If payment is not received within a timely manner we will then have to remove itwwwwishihadajobcom We look forward to hearing from you Please provide us with the URL you would like to advertise Reply to
